title: Quant Club
text: Quant Club, IIT Kharagpur is an initiative for Quantitative Finance by group of Quant enthusiast students. The nature of work done at Quant Club requires perfect blending of Mathematics, Finance & Computational skills. In simple words, Quantitative analysts or "Quants" design and implement complex mathematical models that allow financial firms to price and trade securities.
